ohuge muwin pita wu ginnen awata dawi giyeya.+awilena ginnak ohu wethin nikmuneya.+ 10 ohu ahasa nama pahathata basa aaweya.+anduru walakulu ohuge pada yata thibuneya.+ 11 ohu kerubwarayeku pita nangi+ piyasara karamin aaweya.ohu dewaduthayekuge piyapath* pita nangi enawa dutuweya.+ 12 andhakaraya ohuge kudarama wiya.+anduru wahi walawan ohu wata thibina.+ 13 ohu idiriyen nikmunu dipthiya nisa gini anguru dalwi giyeya.+ 14 ahasa gigurum dennata yehowa dewi salaswuweya.+mahoththamayanange handa dasatha pathiruneya.+ 15 ohu owunwa wisuruwaharimata eethala widdeya.+owunwa wiyawul kirimata akunuwalin pahara dunneya.+ 16 yehowa dewige tharawatuwa nisadaohu husma helu wita athi wu pipirima nisada+ muhudu pathula mathu wiya.+polowe aththiwaram pawa penuneya.+ 17 ihala sita thama hasthaya digu kara ohu ma allagaththeya.+gambauru jalayen ohu mawa ihalata adagaththeya.+ 18 mata waira karana mage balawath sathuran athin ohu mawa galewweya.+ese kale owun mata wada shakthimath wu bawini.+ 19 ma wipaththiwalata muhuna dun wita owuhu digatama mata tharjanaya kaloya.+namuth yehowa dewi mage upakarayata paminiyeya.+ 20 ohu mawa aarakshitha sthanayakata genaweya.+ohu ma gana sathutu wu nisa mawa beragaththeya.+ 21 mage dharmishta kriyawalata anuwa yehowa dewi mata aashirwada karanneya.+ma pawithra jiwithayak gatha karana nisa ohu mata aashirwada karanneya.+ 22 mama yehowa dewige margaye gaman kalemi.+dushta lesa kriya kara mage dewiwa athhara nogiyemi.+ 23 ohu dun siyalu thindu+ mage sithe thabagaththemi.ohuge panathwalin mama iwathwa noyannemi.+ 24 mama nirdosha bawa ohuta oppu kara penwannemi.+waradi kirimen walaki sitinnemi.+ 25 ewita mage dharmishta kriyawalata anuwada+ohu idiriye ma gatha karana pawithra jiwithayata anuwada+ yehowa dewi mata aashirwada karanneya. 26 obawa ath noharina kenekuwa obath kisi kaleka ath noharinnehiya.+oba nirdosha thanaththawa kisi kaleka ath noharinnehiya.+ 27 pawithra sithak athi thanaththata oba aashirwada karannehiya.+wanka thanaththata ohuge kriyawalata anuwa prathipala dennehiya.+ 28 yatahathpahath ayawa oba galawagannehiya.+namuth udangu ayawa oba pahath karannehiya.+ oba owun desa pilikulen balannehiya. 29 yehowa dewiyani, mage pahana obaya.+yehowa dewiyani, andhakaraye sitiyadi mage aalokaya obaya.+ 30 obe upakaraya athuwa mata senawakata wiruddhawa wuwath nangi sitiya haka.+mage dewige upakaraya athuwa mata maha pawurakata wuwath nangiya haka.+ 31 saba dewige margaya paripurnaya.+yehowa dewige wachanaya pawithraya.+ohuge rakawaranaya soyana siyallanta ohu palihakya.+ 32 yehowa dewi hara wena dewi kenek sitida?+ape dewi parwathayaki.

saudi aarabiye sewaya karana shri lankika shramikayange surakshithathawa sambandhayen wishesha wimarshanayak sidukarana bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pawasayi.madaperadiga kalapaye ratawala sewaya karana shri lankika shramikayange ayithiwasikam menma subasadhana katayuthu sambandhayen nirantharayen soya bala awashya kriyamarga ganna bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya saha shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaya eekabaddhawa me wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana bawada widesha katayuthu amathyansha podu sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral sarath disanayaka mahatha "dinamina" ta pawasiya.saudi arabiyawe sewaya kala shri lankika gruha sewika risana nafik wetha marana danduwama labadimath samanga me sambandhayen wishesha awadhanaya yomukara thibena athara widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya saha shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaya niyojanaya karamin widesha ratawala pihiti thanapathi karyalayanhi sewaya niladharin me wenuwen kriyathmaka wana bawada ee mahatha sandahan kaleya.me niladharin danuwath kirimata widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya piyawara gena thibena athara rajyathanthrika mattamin ee sandaha piyawara gena thipena bawada widesha ratawala sewaya karana shri lankika shramikayange aarakshawa, ayithin subasadhana katayuthu aadi sama awashyathawayakma itukirima wenuwen piyawara ganna bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya sandahan karayi.me athara widesha katayuthu amathyansha podu sanniwedana anshaye adhyaksha janaral sarath disanayaka mahatha sandahan kale saudi arabiyawe shri lanka thanapathiwaraya shri lankawata kandawimata thiranaya kalada shri lankawa saha saudi arabiyawa athara thanapathi sabandatha akhandawama kriyathmaka wana bawayi..
